text: Good breakfast.  Price is right.  Friendly atmosphere.   The place is clean.  The coffee sucks, but that's okay
Great little pub. Foods cheap, drinks are good. Atmosphere isn't the best but if your just looking for a place to hang out with friends it's a good time.
Good service, laid back atmosphere with friendly workers. Everything on the menu is cheap as it gets. Good place to go watch sports.

I get it, it's a dive but what place considers mashed potatoes an additional "a la carte" item for a hot roast beef sandwich. We have ordered the hot roast beef from here before and received potatoes. Too bad.
